patthana23.13:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.13:5.1: Nakusalaṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.13:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana23.13:6.1: Nakusalaṃ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.13:6.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
